info.name: github-dark-code
info.description: Dark coloring for code on GitHub
info.additionalInfo: repaints <code> sections in darkgrey ▶ Obsidian color theme ▶ font: Your Favorite monospace; line-height: 1.2   (DejaVu Sans Mono on screenshot) Adapted from: https://userstyles.org/styles/37035/github-dark • 2018.10.10 [*] hotfix for code editor ∙ see also https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/6367-github-sortable-filelist ∙
